Disclaimer â€“ This is a Proof Of Concept Application only. SoftClouds is not responsible for any issues on this app.

Welcome to SoftClouds Telematics Application.

This is a proof of concept of a consumer application that will be distributed by the automotive OEM.

The automotive OEM will be collecting data on the status of the car into its IoT cloud and will communicate with this SoftClouds Telematics application based on rules set at its SIEBEL system.

For demo purposes, the Car is emulated by the android application SoftClouds Car.

SoftClouds Car app transmits all car relevant telematics data points into the Oracle IoT cloud.

 Oracle IoT Cloud collects data, stores it in local database and will send processed data to the SIEBEL CRM of automotive OEM based on rules.

SIEBEL CRM of automotive OEM will communicate to the SoftClouds Telematics consumer application based on rules. Rules could be : Time for oil change, Time to change tires, Upsell warranty, Car Sales programs, etc.
An error occurred while either fetching the InstanceID token, sending the fetched token to the server or subscribing to the PubSub topic. Please try running the App again.
